out_of_space_content.vi: Bạn đã hết chỗ. Hãy lấp đầy hộp dụng cụ với vít đúng và tiếp tục chơi!
out_of_space_content.id: Ruang habis. Isi kotak peralatan dengan sekrup yang benar dan lanjutkan bermain!
out_of_space_content.ru: Нет места. Заполните ящики правильными винтами и продолжайте играть!
out_of_space_content.de: Kein Platz mehr. Fülle die Werkzeugkisten mit den richtigen Schrauben und spiele weiter!
out_of_space_content.ja: スペースが不足しています。 正しいネジでツールボックスを満たし、 ゲームを続けてください！
out_of_space_content.zh-tw: 沒有空間了。 填滿工具箱後繼續遊戲！
out_of_space_content.pt: Você está sem espaço. Preencha as caixas de ferramentas com os parafusos corretos e continue jogando!
out_of_space_content.fr: Vous n'avez plus de place. Remplissez les boîtes à outils avec les bonnes vis et continuez à jouer !
out_of_space_content.ko: 공간이 부족합니다. 올바른 나사로 도구 상자를 채우고 계속 플레이하세요!
out_of_space_content.es: No tienes espacio. Llena las cajas de herramientas con los tornillos correctos y sigue jugando!
out_of_space_content.it: Spazio esaurito. Riempire le cassette degli attrezzi con le viti corrette e continuare a giocare!
out_of_space_content.in: आपका स्थान समाप्त हो गया है। सही स्क्रू से टूलबॉक्स भरें और खेलते रहें!

boost_hammer_guide.vi: Chạm vào kính để phá vỡ
boost_hammer_guide.en: Tap on the glass to break
boost_hammer_guide.de: Tippe auf das Glas, um es zu zerbrechen
boost_hammer_guide.ja: ガラスをタップして壊す
boost_hammer_guide.fr: Tapez sur le verre pour casser
boost_hammer_guide.in: तोड़ने के लिए कांच पर टैप करें

boost_ghost_des.en:
Move through any 
worm or obstacle!

boost_ghost_guide.en: Tap any worm to go the hole
boost_ghost_guide.ja: ダブルツールボックス

stuck_ice_content.vi: Ốc bị kẹt trong băng! Tiếp tục chơi để phá băng.
stuck_ice_content.en: Screw stuck in ice! Keep playing to break all the ice.
stuck_ice_content.id: Sekrup terjebak di es! Terus bermain untuk memecahkan semua es.
stuck_ice_content.ru: Винт застрял в льду! Продолжайте играть, чтобы разбить весь лёд.
stuck_ice_content.de: Schraube im Eis festgefroren! Spiele weiter, um alles Eis zu brechen.
stuck_ice_content.ja: ネジが氷に閉じ込められた！ 氷をすべて壊すためにプレイし続けてください。
stuck_ice_content.zh-tw: 螺絲卡在冰中！ 繼續玩以打破所有的冰。
stuck_ice_content.pt: Parafuso preso no gelo! Continue jogando para quebrar todo o gelo.
stuck_ice_content.fr: Vis coincée dans la glace ! Continuez à jouer pour briser toute la glace.
stuck_ice_content.ko: 나사가 얼음에 갇혔어요! 계속해서 얼음을 모두 깨세요.
stuck_ice_content.es: Tornillo atascado en el hielo! Sigue jugando para romper todo el hielo.
stuck_ice_content.it: Vite bloccata nel ghiaccio! Continua a giocare per rompere tutto il ghiaccio.
stuck_ice_content.in: स्क्रू बर्फ में फंसा है! सारी बर्फ तोड़ने के लिए खेलते रहें।

stuck_toggle_content.vi: Cửa chớp bị đóng! Tiếp tục chơi để mở cửa chớp.
stuck_toggle_content.en: Shutter is closed! Keep playing to remove all the shutters.
stuck_toggle_content.id: Jendela tertutup! Terus bermain untuk membuka semua jendela.
stuck_toggle_content.ru: Жалюзи закрыты! Продолжайте играть, чтобы снять все жалюзи.
stuck_toggle_content.de: Der Rollladen ist geschlossen! Spiele weiter, um alle Rollläden zu entfernen.
stuck_toggle_content.ja: シャッターが閉じています！ シャッターをすべて取り除くためにプレイし続けてください。
stuck_toggle_content.zh-tw: 百葉窗關閉了！ 繼續玩以移除所有百葉窗。
stuck_toggle_content.pt: Persiana fechada! Continue jogando para remover todas as persianas.
stuck_toggle_content.fr: Volet fermé ! Continuez à jouer pour enlever tous les volets.
stuck_toggle_content.ko: 셔터가 닫혔어요! 계속해서 셔터를 모두 제거하세요.
stuck_toggle_content.es: Persiana cerrada! Sigue jugando para quitar todas las persianas.
stuck_toggle_content.it: Tapparella chiusa! Continua a giocare per rimuovere tutte le tapparelle.
stuck_toggle_content.in: शटर बंद है! सभी शटर हटाने के लिए खेलते रहें।

bomb_exploded_content.vi: Bom đã nổ! Tiếp tục chơi để hồi sinh.
bomb_exploded_content.en: The bomb exploded! Keep playing to revive.
bomb_exploded_content.id: Bom meledak! Terus bermain untuk hidup kembali.
bomb_exploded_content.ru: Бомба взорвалась! Продолжайте играть, чтобы возродиться.
bomb_exploded_content.de: Die Bombe ist explodiert! Spiele weiter, um dich wiederzubeleben.
bomb_exploded_content.ja: 爆弾が爆発しました！ 復活するためにプレイし続けてください。
bomb_exploded_content.zh-tw: 炸彈爆炸了！ 繼續玩以復活。
bomb_exploded_content.pt: A bomba explodiu! Continue jogando para reviver.
bomb_exploded_content.fr: La bombe a explosé ! Continuez à jouer pour vous ressusciter.
bomb_exploded_content.es: ¡La bomba explotó! Sigue jugando para revivir.
bomb_exploded_content.it: La bomba è esplosa! Continua a giocare per rivivere.
bomb_exploded_content.in: बम फट गया! पुनर्जीवित होने के लिए खेलते रहें।

time_up_content.vi: Tiếp tục chơi để thêm giờ
time_up_content.ru: Продолжайте играть, чтобы добавить больше времени
time_up_content.de: Spiele weiter, um mehr Zeit hinzuzufügen
time_up_content.ja: 時間を追加するためにプレイし続ける
time_up_content.zh-tw: 繼續玩以增加更多時間
time_up_content.pt: Continue jogando para adicionar mais tempo
time_up_content.fr: Continuez à jouer pour ajouter du temps
time_up_content.es: Sigue jugando para añadir más tiempo
time_up_content.it: Continua a giocare per aggiungere più tempo
time_up_content.in: अधिक समय जोड़ने के लिए खेलते रहें

timer_startup_game.ja: レベルをクリアするには

tap_to_close.in: बंद करने के लिए टैप करें

tap_to_continue.in: जारी रखने के लिए टैप करें

help_guide_first_level.vi: Điền hộp công cụ với các ốc phù hợp
help_guide_first_level.id: Isi kotak alat dengan sekrup yang cocok
help_guide_first_level.ru: Заполните ящики для инструментов подходящими винтами
help_guide_first_level.de: Fülle die Werkzeugkästen mit passenden Schrauben
help_guide_first_level.ja: 一致するねじでツールボックスを満たす
help_guide_first_level.zh-tw: 將匹配的螺絲填滿工具箱
help_guide_first_level.pt: Preencha as caixas de ferramentas com parafusos correspondentes
help_guide_first_level.fr: Remplissez les boîtes à outils avec des vis assorties
help_guide_first_level.es: Llena las cajas de herramientas con tornillos coincidentes
help_guide_first_level.it: Riempi le cassette degli attrezzi con viti abbinate
help_guide_first_level.in: मेल खाते स्क्रू से टूलबॉक्स भरें

help_guide_star_screw.vi: Sử dụng ốc hình <color=#FFFF00>ngôi sao</color> khi cần
help_guide_star_screw.ru: Используйте винты в форме <color=#FFFF00>звезды</color>, когда нужно
help_guide_star_screw.ja: 必要に応じて<color=#FFFF00>星形</color>のねじを使用する
help_guide_star_screw.zh-tw: 當需要時使用<color=#FFFF00>星形</color>螺絲
help_guide_star_screw.pt: Use parafusos em forma de <color=#FFFF00>estrela</color> quando necessário
help_guide_star_screw.fr: Utilisez des vis en forme d'étoile <color=#FFFF00>étoile</color> lorsque nécessaire
help_guide_star_screw.es: Usa tornillos con forma de <color=#FFFF00>estrella</color> cuando sea necesario
help_guide_star_screw.it: Usa viti a forma di <color=#FFFF00>stella</color> quando necessario
help_guide_star_screw.in: आवश्यक होने पर <color=#FFFF00>तारों के आकार</color> वाले स्क्रू का उपयोग करें

help_guide_link_screw.vi: Các ốc được kết nối sẽ di chuyển cùng nhau
help_guide_link_screw.ja: 接続されたねじは一緒に動く
help_guide_link_screw.fr: Les vis connectées se déplacent ensemble
help_guide_link_screw.es: Los tornillos conectados se mueven juntos
help_guide_link_screw.it: Le viti connesse si muovono insieme
help_guide_link_screw.in: जुड़े हुए स्क्रू एक साथ चलते हैं

help_guide_ice_screw.vi: Phá <color=#00FFFF>BĂNG</color> bằng cách thu thập bất kỳ 3 ốc
help_guide_ice_screw.en: Break the <color=#00FFFF>ICE</color> by collecting any 3 screws
help_guide_ice_screw.id: Hancurkan <color=#00FFFF>ES</color> dengan mengumpulkan 3 sekrup apa saja
help_guide_ice_screw.de: Brich das <color=#00FFFF>EIS</color>, indem du 3 beliebige Schrauben sammelst
help_guide_ice_screw.ja: 任意の3つのねじを集めて<color=#00FFFF>氷</color>を壊す
help_guide_ice_screw.zh-tw: 收集任意 3 顆螺絲以打破<color=#00FFFF>冰塊</color>
help_guide_ice_screw.in: किसी भी 3 स्क्रू इकट्ठा करके <color=#00FFFF>बर्फ</color> को तोड़ें

help_guide_toggle_screw.vi: Cửa chớp mở hoặc đóng mỗi lượt di chuyển
help_guide_toggle_screw.en: Shutter opens or closes with each move
help_guide_toggle_screw.id: Jendela tertutup atau terbuka setiap kali bergerak
help_guide_toggle_screw.ru: Жалюзи открываются или закрываются с каждым ходом
help_guide_toggle_screw.de: Der Rollladen öffnet oder schließt sich bei jedem Zug
help_guide_toggle_screw.ja: シャッターは移動ごとに開閉する
help_guide_toggle_screw.zh-tw: 每次移動時快門會開關
help_guide_toggle_screw.pt: O obturador abre ou fecha a cada movimento
help_guide_toggle_screw.fr: Le volet s'ouvre ou se ferme à chaque mouvement
help_guide_toggle_screw.ko: 한 번 움직일 때마다 셔터가 열리고 닫힙니다
help_guide_toggle_screw.es: La persiana se abre o se cierra con cada movimiento
help_guide_toggle_screw.it: L'otturatore si apre o si chiude con ogni mossa
help_guide_toggle_screw.in: प्रत्येक चाल के साथ शटर खुलता या बंद होता है

help_guide_bomb_screw.vi: Gỡ bom trước khi hết lượt di chuyển
help_guide_bomb_screw.en: Clear the bomb before running out of its moves
help_guide_bomb_screw.ru: Обезвредьте бомбу, пока не закончились ходы
help_guide_bomb_screw.de: Entschärfe die Bombe, bevor die Züge ausgehen
help_guide_bomb_screw.ja: 爆弾が動き切る前に解除する
help_guide_bomb_screw.zh-tw: 在炸彈步數用完之前清除它
help_guide_bomb_screw.pt: Desarme a bomba antes de acabar os movimentos
help_guide_bomb_screw.fr: Désamorcez la bombe avant d'épuiser les mouvements
help_guide_bomb_screw.ko: 남은 이동 횟수 전에 폭탄을 제거하세요
help_guide_bomb_screw.es: Desactiva la bomba antes de quedarte sin movimientos
help_guide_bomb_screw.it: Disinnesca la bomba prima che finisca i movimenti
help_guide_bomb_screw.in: उसके चालें समाप्त होने से पहले बम को साफ करें

help_guide_chain_screw.vi: Loại bỏ dây xích để giải phóng ốc bị xích
help_guide_chain_screw.en: Remove connected chains to free the chained screw
help_guide_chain_screw.id: Hapus rantai yang terhubung untuk membebaskan sekrup yang terikat
help_guide_chain_screw.ru: Удалите соединенные цепи, чтобы освободить винт
help_guide_chain_screw.de: Entferne die verbundenen Ketten, um die gefangene Schraube zu befreien
help_guide_chain_screw.ja: 接続された鎖を外して縛られたねじを解放する
help_guide_chain_screw.zh-tw: 移除連接的鏈條以解放鎖住的螺絲
help_guide_chain_screw.pt: Remova as correntes conectadas para liberar o parafuso preso
help_guide_chain_screw.fr: Retirez les chaînes connectées pour libérer la vis enchaînée
help_guide_chain_screw.ko: 연결된 체인을 제거하여 묶인 나사를 풀어주세요
help_guide_chain_screw.es: Elimina las cadenas conectadas para liberar el tornillo encadenado
help_guide_chain_screw.it: Rimuovi le catene connesse per liberare la vite incatenata
help_guide_chain_screw.in: श्रृंखलाओं को हटा दें ताकि श्रृंखला से बंधा स्क्रू मुक्त हो जाए

help_guide_lockkit_screw.vi: Giải phóng chìa khóa để mở khóa
help_guide_lockkit_screw.en: Free the key to unlock the lock
help_guide_lockkit_screw.de: Befreie den Schlüssel, um das Schloss zu öffnen
help_guide_lockkit_screw.ja: 鍵を解放してロックを解除する
help_guide_lockkit_screw.pt: Libere a chave para destrancar a fechadura
help_guide_lockkit_screw.fr: Libérez la clé pour déverrouiller la serrure
help_guide_lockkit_screw.es: Libera la llave para desbloquear el candado
help_guide_lockkit_screw.it: Libera la chiave per sbloccare la serratura
help_guide_lockkit_screw.in: ताला खोलने के लिए चाबी को मुक्त करें

no_more_life.ja: ライフがもうありません！

remove_ads_des_1.vi: Gỡ quảng cáo giữa các màn
remove_ads_des_1.en: Remove ads between levels and also banner ads.
remove_ads_des_1.ja: レベル間の広告を削除する
remove_ads_des_1.fr: Supprimer les publicités entre les niveaux
remove_ads_des_1.it: Rimuovi gli annunci tra i livelli

remove_ads_des_2.ja: バナー広告を削除する

remove_ads_des_3.vi: *Quảng cáo tùy chọn để nhận thưởng sẽ vẫn còn
remove_ads_des_3.en: Optional ads for rewards will stay.
remove_ads_des_3.id: *Iklan opsional untuk hadiah akan tetap ada
remove_ads_des_3.fr: *Les pubs optionnelles pour des récompenses resteront
remove_ads_des_3.es: *Los anuncios opcionales para recompensas se mantendrán
remove_ads_des_3.it: *Gli annunci opzionali per le ricompense rimarranno

character_not_support.vi: Ký tự không được hỗ trợ.
character_not_support.ja: サポートされていない文字です。

alert_not_enough_gold.ja: ゴールドが足りません！
alert_not_enough_gold.in: आपके पास पर्याप्त सोना नहीं है!

tournament_des.vi: Thắng liên tục để tăng hệ số điểm!
tournament_des.en: Win levels without failing to increase the score multiplier!
tournament_des.id: Menangkan level tanpa kalah untuk meningkatkan pengganda skor!
tournament_des.ru: Выигрывайте уровни без поражений, чтобы увеличить множитель очков!
tournament_des.de: Gewinne Level ohne zu verlieren, um den Punktmultiplikator zu erhöhen!
tournament_des.ja: 失敗せずにレベルをクリアして、 スコア倍率を増やそう！
tournament_des.zh-tw: 不失敗地贏得關卡來增加分數加乘！
tournament_des.pt: Vença níveis sem falhar para aumentar o multiplicador de pontuação!
tournament_des.fr: Gagnez des niveaux sans échouer pour augmenter le multiplicateur de score !
tournament_des.ko: 실패 없이 레벨을 승리하여 점수 배수를 증가시키세요!
tournament_des.es: ¡Gana niveles sin fallar para aumentar el multiplicador de puntuación!
tournament_des.it: Vinci i livelli senza fallire per aumentare il moltiplicatore di punteggio!
tournament_des.in: अंक गुणक बढ़ाने के लिए बिना हारे स्तरों को जीतें!

win_streak_warning.vi: Ối! Thua sẽ đặt lại hệ số điểm của bạn!
win_streak_warning.en: Oops! Losing will reset your score multiplier!
win_streak_warning.id: Ups! Kalah akan mengatur ulang pengganda skor Anda!
win_streak_warning.ru: Ой! Поражение сбросит ваш множитель очков!
win_streak_warning.de: Ups! Eine Niederlage setzt deinen Punktmultiplikator zurück!
win_streak_warning.ja: おっと！ 負けるとスコア倍率がリセットされます！
win_streak_warning.zh-tw: 哎呀！ 失敗會重置你的分數加乘！
win_streak_warning.pt: Ops! Perder irá redefinir o seu multiplicador de pontuação!
win_streak_warning.fr: Oups ! Perdre réinitialisera votre multiplicateur de score !
win_streak_warning.es: ¡Ups! Perder reiniciará tu multiplicador de puntuación.
win_streak_warning.it: Ops! La sconfitta azzererà il moltiplicatore di punteggio!
win_streak_warning.in: ओह! हारने से आपका अंक गुणक रीसेट हो जाएगा!

type_your_name.ja: 名前を入力してください...

pinball_welcome.vi: CHÀO MỪNG ĐẾN VỚI CHUYẾN DU HÀNH VŨ TRỤ
pinball_welcome.id: SELAMAT DATANG DI PERJALANAN LUAR ANGKASA
pinball_welcome.ja: ようこそ、 宇宙旅行へ
pinball_welcome.in: अंतरिक्ष यात्रा में आपका स्वागत है

pinball_help.vi: Sự kiện Chuyến Du Hành Vũ Trụ diễn ra sau khi bạn hoàn thành một cấp độ khó. Kéo cần gạt và đẩy quả cầu va chạm với các yếu tố, kiếm điểm và chuyển đổi thành Vàng.
pinball_help.en:
The Space Trip event takes place after you complete a hard level.
Pull the lever and push the orb to collide with elements, earning points that convert to Gold.
pinball_help.id: Acara Perjalanan Luar Angkasa berlangsung setelah Anda menyelesaikan level sulit. Tarik tuas dan dorong bola untuk bertabrakan dengan elemen, mendapatkan poin yang dikonversi menjadi Emas.
pinball_help.ru: Событие Космическое Путешествие начинается после завершения сложного уровня. Потяните за рычаг и толкните шар, чтобы он столкнулся с элементами, зарабатывая очки, которые конвертируются в золото.
pinball_help.de: Das Weltraumreise-Event findet statt, nachdem du ein schweres Level abgeschlossen hast. Ziehe den Hebel und stoße die Kugel an, damit sie mit Elementen kollidiert, um Punkte zu sammeln, die in Gold umgewandelt werden.
pinball_help.ja: 宇宙旅行イベントは、 難しいレベルをクリアした後に行われます。 レバーを引いて、 オーブを要素にぶつけてポイントを獲得し、 それをゴールドに変換します。
pinball_help.zh-tw: 太空之旅活動在你完成一個困難關卡後開始。 拉動槓桿並推動球體與元素碰撞，獲取轉換為金幣的點數。
pinball_help.pt: O evento Viagem Espacial acontece após você completar um nível difícil. Puxe a alavanca e empurre o orbe para colidir com os elementos, ganhando pontos que são convertidos em Ouro.
pinball_help.fr: L'événement Voyage Spatial a lieu après avoir complété un niveau difficile. Tirez le levier et poussez l'orbe pour entrer en collision avec des éléments, en gagnant des points convertis en or.
pinball_help.ko: 우주 여행 이벤트는 어려운 레벨을 완료한 후에 진행됩니다. 레버를 당기고 구체를 밀어 요소와 충돌시켜 점수를 얻고, 이를 골드로 전환하세요.
pinball_help.es: El evento Viaje Espacial ocurre después de que completes un nivel difícil. Tira de la palanca y empuja el orbe para chocar con los elementos, ganando puntos que se convierten en Oro.
pinball_help.it: L'evento Viaggio Spaziale si svolge dopo aver completato un livello difficile. Tira la leva e spingi l'orbo per farlo scontrare con gli elementi, guadagnando punti convertiti in Oro.
pinball_help.in: अंतरिक्ष यात्रा कार्यक्रम कठिन स्तर पूरा करने के बाद होता है। लीवर खींचें और बॉल को तत्वों से टकराने के लिए धक्का दें, अंक कमाएं जो सोने में परिवर्तित होते हैं।

tournament_help_text_2.en:
COLLECT MORE CUPS 
THAN OTHER PLAYERS

tournament_help_text_4.en: BEAT CONSECUTIVE LEVEL TO INCREASE THE MULTIPLIER!

tournament_help_text_5.en: IF YOU FAIL A LEVEL, THE MULTIPLIER WILL RESET

tuornament_popup_des.en: Win a level to join Tournament and complete for amazing rewards

racing_lose_des.en: Try again and take the lead for prize!

racing_banner_des.en:
Complete with other player!
Whoever get to Level <color=#00FF00>{0}</color> first win the top prize!

pinball_help_1.en:
BEAT LEVELS TO
COLLECT SPACE BALLS!

pinball_help_2.en:
SHOOT SPACE BALLS
AND GAIN SCORE!

rate_us_des.en: If you like our game, please give us 5 stars praise

alert_wifi_des.en: Please check the internet connection on your device.

alert_update_version_des.en: Update now for a better, more exciting game experience!

ads_rewarded_not_complete.en: The rewarded ads was not completed.

help_guide_clover.en: Collect clovers to earn exciting rewards!

weekly_leaderboard_join.en: Win a match to join the weekly contest.

piggy_bank_des.en: The more you collect, the better the value

win_streak_des.en:
Complete levels without failing! 
If you fail, you'll fall back down.

new_feature_des1_xich.en:
The worm is locked and will be
 unlocked after a few turns

new_feature_des2_xich.en: Play a few turns to rescue this worm

new_feature_des1_ken.en: You have rescued the Cocoon Slither

new_feature_des2_ken.en: Send a slither to crack open the cocoon and wake it up!

new_feature_des1_pair.en:
These slithers are linked 
One can't go without the other

new_feature_des2_pair.en: They can only go in when two holes open

new_feature_des1_bomb.en: The slither is carrying a ticking bomb!

new_feature_des2_bomb.en: Move it before the countdown ends

new_feature_des1_secret_hole.en: This hole is blocked by rocks

new_feature_des2_secret_hole.en: It will reopen after a few turns
